news.title: AI was behind over 50,000 layoffs in 2025 — here are the top firms to cite it for job cuts
news.summary: Some of the world's biggest tech companies cited AI as part of their layoff and restructuring strategy in 2025. Some of the largest tech companies are laying off workers and cutting jobs in favor of AI.

news.title: Epstein files: A number of documents, including Trump photo, reportedly removed from DOJ release site
news.summary: A missing photo shows a desk displaying a large assortment of framed pictures and other items. Among them is a picture showing President Donald Trump's face.

news.title: Xbox is losing the console race by miles. It's part of Microsoft's big gaming pivot
news.summary: Sales of Microsoft's Xbox Series S and Series X are even behind the original Nintendo Switch, which launched in 2017. Sales of the original Switch were even higher than those of the Xbox One.

news.title: Roomba's bankruptcy may wreck a lot more than one robot vacuum maker
news.summary: Roomba's bankruptcy should serve as a warning sign to many small companies that big tech may not be able to come to the rescue, experts say.

news.title: CNBC's Official College Sports Valuations 2025: Top 75 athletic programs
news.summary: The top 75 programs in the world are worth a combined $51.22 billion. That's 13% more than the top 75 in last year's rankings.

news.title: ‘I’m not looking to leave any money to the kids’: We’re in our 60s with $1.5 million in IRAs. Can we retire next year?
news.summary: “Our current salary combined is $210,000,” he says. “We’re in a position of power. We’ve got to do something.”

news.title: My husband and I are splitting our estate between his child and my three children. Should they get equal shares?
news.summary: “We try to help all our kids when we can, yet push for self-sufficiency,” she says. “We’re trying to help them as much as we can.”

news.title: ‘I don’t know how much my wife earns’: I’m 63 with $6.4 million in stocks, mostly Apple. Will I get punished on taxes?
news.summary: “Each of our properties are worth over $1 million,” he says. “Each one of us is worth more than a million dollars.”

news.title: You’ve just won the $1.5 billion Powerball jackpot. Here are the 5 money moves you need to make next.
news.summary: Even if you’re not a big lottery winner, it’s still worth heeding this advice for managing a significant sum of money.

news.title: I’m only 54 and my 401(k) plan is emailing me about buying annuities. Is this something I should do?
news.summary: Signing up for an annuity is something you want to carefully consider. Options will keep coming, but signing up is something to consider carefully.
